name: Timmy the Money Badger and the Glassmines
name_original: Timmy the Money Badger and the Glassmines
description:
Timmy the Money Badger is trying to escape  the Glassmines which are full of mines of course.  Figure out how not to step on the mine!

Manual:

Action Button = Space
Directional Buttons = WASD and Arrow Keys

In the start-up state, use left and right to change the time and use up and down to change the "Game". A game in the game and watch context often refers to the difficulty.
When you are ready, press the "Action Button" to start the game.
When the game is running, you move around with the directional keys.
Each square counts the bomb on itself and bombs vertically and horizontally adjacent to itself.

This game was made for a university course.
